trans-unit.source:
Hej %firstName%,

thank you for registering with Matchico. From now on, you will benefit from our network of selected specialists. We will also be happy to talk to you in person to discuss further steps. Simply select a suitable date under the following link: https://calendly.com/michel-rothgaenger.

In the meantime, if you have any questions about any of our services, simply reply to this e-mail. We will get back to you as soon as possible.

Best regards,
Michel Rothgaenger
Chief Operating Officer
Matchico

Matchico
